MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH6 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Leith Walk and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:18pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a suspected blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:09 PM on Sunday, 31 January 2021
